name: Space Invaders Redux
description:
Space Invaders Redux a tiny top-down space shooter demo

A very simple arcade bullet-hell game, where the objective is to stay alive for as long as possible. Why not give this a shot and see which one of your friends can endure the muffled eurobeat background music the longest?

Features:

  • Enemies which move along predefined paths and shoot projectiles
  • A steerable spaceship, capable of returning fire to the endless hordes of enemies
  • A health and score counter - all out of lives and re-tries? Game over.
  • Hand-made (or rather, mouth-made) sound effects
  • Scrolling background with stars whooshing by
  • A  pretty neat explosion particle effect
  • Boss battle with healthbar

made by Pavol Pánisz
